text: fla takun -ayha alrswl- fi shakin min btlan ma yaebud hwla' almushrikun min qwmk, ma yaebudun min al'awthan 'iilaa mithl ma yaebud abawuhum min qbl, wa'iinaa lamuafuwhum ma waeadnahum tammaan ghyr mnqws. whdha tawjih lajamie alamt, wa'iin kan lfzh mwjhana 'iilaa alrasul salaa allah ealayh wsllam
